scripts.build-android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file js/index.js --bundle-output android/fancylib/src/main/assets/unifiedsdk.bundle --assets-dest android/fancylib/src/main/res
scripts.build-ios: react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file js/index.js --bundle-output ios/FancyLib/FancyLib/js/unifiedsdk.bundle --assets-dest ios/FancyLib/FancyLib/assets/
